title._content: Image taken from page 35 of 'Bishop Hatto: a legend of the Mouse-Tower on the Rhine, illustrated by V. H. Darwin'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Bishop Hatto: a legend of the Mouse-Tower on the Rhine, illustrated by V. H. Darwin", "Selections and Extracts" Author: SOUTHEY, Robert. Contributor: DARWIN, V. H. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 11647.g.21." Page: 35 Place of Publishing: London, [1861.] Date of Publishing: 1861 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003448845 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
